ideas.title: Morning Briefs
ideas.summary: Automated 08:00 CET voice briefing via Telegram. Weather, calendar, tasks, one proactive suggestion. ~90s audio, weekdays only.

ideas.title: Genome Insight Pipeline
ideas.summary: Local-first genotyping analysis pipeline. Parses 23andMe/Ancestry/MyHeritage exports, maps to ClinVar + PharmGKB, produces 3 reports (genetic traits, disease risk, action protocol). 3-layer architecture: hard annotations, rule-based interpretation, optional LLM narration.

ideas.title: Dashboard Overhaul
ideas.summary: Significantly improve the Claude Memory Dashboard. Real-time project health, cross-project insights, interactive features (drag-drop kanban, inline notes, search), data visualizations (Chart.js), mobile-friendly responsive design, session history widget.

ideas.title: Claude Cron Automation
ideas.summary: Scheduled autonomous tasks that run on cron/Task Scheduler. Accumulate data over time, build databases from scratch (ClinVar index, PharmGKB cache, finance reconciliation), auto-publish dashboard, health-check projects. Simple Python runner with YAML config, SQLite for accumulated state, upgrade path to Claude SDK agent.
